ygData.subject: Re: *spoiler** Two Robes:Chain mail looking and Blueish with fancy Trim
ygData.msgSnippet: The light blue one with gold trim is the Observer robe.  EqVault had a group shot of the guild  who made level 50.  There s a couple mages
ygData.messageBody:
The light blue one with gold trim is the Observer robe. EqVault had a group
shot of the guild <fire of the heavens> who made level 50. There's a couple
mages there wearing those robes. I met a wizard last night who was wearing
this and confirmed it with me. Believe it or not, he was a level 1 Wiz.
Apparently, he got it from his other character 46lvl Paladin.

He says he got the robe off of a 30ish lvl (?) guard in the Ocean of Tears.
Must be one of the islands there.

I've never seen the chainmail-looking one although I've heard rumours on
this list that one exists?

-- Lim'Dul
16 lvl (invisibility yaaay!) Veeshan

>Subject: Question on Two Robes:Chain mail looking and Blueish with fancy
>Trim

>The other night I noticed a couple new robes that I hadnt seen before. The
>first
>was a Blue looking robe with fancy trim like the black robe has. Anyone
>know
>where to get that and the stats on it? Second I saw a char with a robe that
>looked like it was chain mail. I am not sure if this char was a Wizard(was
>playing anon and would not talk to me when I asked about the robe). Anyone
>know
>what that was and where it is found?
Thanks
